metadata.title: CVE-2023-32697 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: SQLite JDBC is a library for accessing and creating SQLite database files in Java. Sqlite-jdbc addresses a remote code execution vulnerability via JDBC URL. This issue impacting versions 3.6.14.1 through 3.41.2.1 and has been fixed in version 3.41.2.2.

criterions.comment: xerial-sqlite-jdbc package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
